SICCSPageTitle: Check and confirm what the limited partnership will be doing
SICCSTableHeader: Our records show these SIC codes for the limited partnership:
SICCSAddSICInsetInstructions: Start typing a keyword to see a list of business activities. For example, 'motor' or the numerical SIC code if you know it.
SICCSWhatIsDetailExpanderParagraph1: The SIC (Standard Industrial Classification) code indicates the nature of the partnership's business. A partnership can have up to 4 SIC codes.
SICCSWhatIsDetailExpanderParagraph2: You can't create your own trade description for your company. You need to search for a business activity using keywords that best describe what your company does.
SICCSWhatIsDetailExpanderParagraph3: If you can't find an exact match then you should search for other keywords that relate to your business activities.
SICCSWhatIsDetailExpanderParagraph4Start: You can check the on the
SICCSWhatIsDetailExpanderParagraph4Link: list of trade descriptions (opens in a new tab)
SICCSWhatIsDetailExpanderParagraph4End: Companies House website to help you find a suitable business activity.
